License beats and instrmentals below

Music is an incredible platform that allows artist to create something that people can connect to. We see if all the time with our favourite artists and we watch them grow from one off youtube song, through to the first EP and then to shows.

I sell exclusive and non-exclusive licenses to my instrumentals in order to make it more accessible to you. It’s a tough grind so feel free to get in touch if there’s a different way that I can help you out. Music is a people game.

My first love is hip hop so you can hear that my sound has a more modern hip hop, R’n’B and pop feel. It’s all structured in a way that your listeners can follow your songs and want to hear more from you.
